data.context: Additionally, the transition to the cloud is prompting enterprises to change software vendors away from all-in-one ERP systems to application specific that are best of breed.
data.question: What are the events?
data.answers:
Cause: the transition to the cloud
Effect: prompting enterprises to change software vendors away from all-in-one ERP systems to application specific
Relation: enable

data.context: We expect annual earnings growth at Georgia Power to accelerate to high-single digits after Vogtle is completed and penalty returns on equity fade.
data.question: What are the events?
data.answers:
Cause: Vogtle is completed and penalty returns on equity fade
Effect: annual earnings growth at Georgia Power to accelerate to high-single digits
Relation: cause
